title: [Feature Request] LuaRocks style package manager for community made packages
body_html:
Hi,

I was wondering if there are any plans to have a luarocks style package manager for pytorch. I'm not talking about just installing stuff (which can be easily done via conda, pip) but a package manager specific to PyTorch, which can have community made packages (like Torch has for computer vision etc).

Any thoughts?

body:
Hi, 

I was wondering if there are any plans to have a luarocks style package manager for pytorch. I'm not talking about just installing stuff (which can be easily done via conda, pip) but a package manager specific to PyTorch, which can have community made packages (like Torch has for computer vision etc). 

Any thoughts?
